topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Install the Application Lifecycle Service (ALS)

ul.li: The HDP Installer 2.0, also known as HDPI, must already be installed.
A properly configured clouds.yaml file. Note that there is no specific sub-section in the clouds.yaml file for the Application Lifecycle Service.

ol.li: List the available ALS versions to install.openstack hdpi list --os-cloud mycloud | grep alsThe output should include:| als | wscatalog.#### | 2.0.0 | available |

Use the ALS version number to view the details of the specific package. The output provides significant administration information such as download size, version, and so forth.openstack hdpi show wscatalog.#### --os-cloud mycloud The output will appear similar to: +---------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | Field | Value | +---------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | actions | install,progress,download | | description | Application Lifecycle Service for HPE Helion Development Platform. | | download_size | 4939731158 | | email | | | id | wscatalog.2800 | | name | Application Lifecycle Service 2.0 RC3 | | package_id | x11.6f198d79-a61b-4518-9cc4-3e7629e0fb8b | | provider_name | Hewlett Packard Enterprise | | service | als | | sku | A5FDCA94-026F-A579-0A38-BE4AE3117B7E | | state | downloaded | | type | PaaS Workloads | | version | 2.0.0.548 | | webpage | http://www.hp.com/helion/devplatform | +---------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+

body.section: Install the ALS serviceIf you downloaded previously: openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install <downloaded filename>If you have not yet downloaded:Run the following command: Downloading may take a significant amount of time; depending on network traffic, it could take 20-90 minutes.openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install wscatalog.####Either way, once you start the installer bla bla The output will appear similar to: Downloading Application Lifecycle Service which is available Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (available) Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (downloading) ...
